Please acknowledge Enrichr-KG in your publications by citing the following reference:
Evangelista JE, Xie Z, Marino GB, Nguyen N, Clarke DJB, Ma'ayan A. Enrichr-KG: bridging enrichment analysis across multiple libraries. Nucleic Acids Res. 2023 May 11:gkad393. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkad393. PMID: 37166973.
